Blockchain as a Service.solutions: Blockchain-as-a-Service (BaaS) provides third-party cloud infrastructure for developing and managing Blockchain applications without in-house investment. It operates similarly to SaaS, PaaS, and IaaS models.
Blockchain as a Service.key_features: Cloud-based Blockchain application development, hosting, and maintenance; Support for smart contracts; Data security features; Bandwidth management; Resource allocation.
Blockchain as a Service.platform_offering: Simplified, no-code or low-code solutions for deploying and managing EVM-compatible blockchains, targeted at users seeking to create decentralized applications or private blockchain networks without extensive coding knowledge.

BlockchainServices.Solutions: Provides a secure and scalable platform for creating, deploying, and managing blockchain networks

KeyFeatures.High security standards: Utilizes Hyperledger Fabric for secure transactions
KeyFeatures.Integration capabilities: Easily integrates with existing systems and applications
KeyFeatures.Analytics tools: Offers advanced analytics for monitoring blockchain performance

BlockchainServices.PlatformType: Enterprise-focused platform for creating blockchain networks with advanced features

BlockchainServices.Solutions: Enables the creation of blockchain applications using various protocols like Ethereum, Corda, and Quorum

KeyFeatures.Template library: Provides pre-built templates for quick blockchain network setup
KeyFeatures.Scalability options: Supports scaling of blockchain networks based on demand
KeyFeatures.Developer tools: Offers a range of tools for developers to build and deploy blockchain solutions

BlockchainServices.PlatformType: Flexible platform supporting multiple blockchain protocols for diverse use cases

BlockchainServices.Solutions: Simplifies the creation and management of scalable blockchain networks using Hyperledger Fabric or Ethereum

KeyFeatures.Automated scaling: Automatically scales network resources based on usage
KeyFeatures.Managed nodes: Handles node provisioning and maintenance tasks
KeyFeatures.Monitoring tools: Provides monitoring tools for network performance and health

BlockchainServices.PlatformType: Scalable and managed blockchain service for various business applications

Blockchain_as_a_Service.name: Blockchain as a Service (BaaS)
usecases: Develop, host, and adopt blockchain applications
Utilize cloud-based solutions for blockchain technology
Blockchain_as_a_Service.solutions: Cloud-based solutions for developing, hosting, and adopting blockchain applications
key_features: Support activities like incident management and security surveillance

Solutions: Azure Managed Confidential Consortium Framework Preview
Blockchain_Services.Additional_Info: Azure Blockchain Service offers solutions for building decentralized applications and private blockchain networks. It provides features like Quorum Blockchain Service, Microsoft Entra Verified ID, Azure Managed Confidential Consortium Framework Preview, and Azure confidential ledger. The service emphasizes on being fully managed, supporting decentralized networks, offering a developer-friendly ecosystem, and engaging with Microsoft Research for innovative solutions.

usecases: Tamper-resistant blockchain tables in Oracle Database
solutions: Cloud service for blockchain technology adoption
On-premises edition for greater data privacy
SaaS application for supply chain management
Crypto-Secure Data Management in Oracle Database

Oracle Blockchain Platform Cloud Service: Integrate blockchain transactions with other applications
Oracle Blockchain Platform Enterprise Ed: All components for a Hyperledger Fabric blockchain
Oracle Blockchain Platform console and DevOps APIs
Oracle REST API for transactions, queries, and events
Identity management via OpenLDAP, MS Active Directory, and Oracle Directory
Intelligent Track and Trace: Leverage blockchain technology with less risk
Track, trace, and monitor product conditions
Connect to other applications and data sources
Oracle Database Crypto-Secure Data Manag: Immutable Tables for preventing illicit insider changes
Blockchain Tables for detecting illicit hacker changes
Distributed Table Digest for detecting DB rollbacks or illicit changes
User Data Signing for preventing fraud by impersonators

Blockchain_Service.name: Accenture Blockchain Solutions
Blockchain_Service.solutions: Accenture offers blockchain solutions for various industries and use cases, focusing on integrating blockchain technology into existing enterprise software and cloud services.

Web3 Gateway.Key Features: A complete stack for enterprises to build and scale secure web3 applications

Digital Asset Platform.Key Features: Launch an institutional-grade digital asset platform on public or private chains

NFT Platform.Key Features: Own and operate a mass-scale dedicated NFT platform with zero gas fees

Blockchain as a Service.Additional Information: Kaleido offers a range of blockchain solutions catering to various industries with a focus on enterprise-grade security and scalability. The platform provides easy governance, accelerates development, and offers next-generation security features.

usecases: Businesses integrating digital assets into trading platforms
www.hollaex.com.solutions: HollaEx is a white-label exchange solution that connects businesses to the blockchain world, allowing for easy setup of customized crypto exchanges with features like branding, user onboarding, and operator controls.

key_features.Customizable Platform: Ability to add coins and markets, customize branding, and market on your own website
key_features.Operator Controls: Master exchange dynamics with admin controls for deploying capital, adjusting fees, setting up staking pools, etc.
key_features.Automated Trade Matching Engine: Fast and custom trade matching engine for efficient trading experience
key_features.Security Features: Battle-tested software with audits, secure wallet integration, and high standard security policies
key_features.Revenue Sharing Model: Unique revenue-sharing model where trading fees contribute to a collective pool
